item.title: Comparison of Anterior-Posterior versus Anterior-Lateral electrode position in cardioverting atrial fibrillation: Protocol for a randomized clinical trial
item.description: Protocol Title: Comparison of Anterior-Posterior versus Anterior-Lateral electrode position in cardioverting atrial fibrillation: Protocol for a randomized clinical trial Short title: AP versus AL electrode position Authors: Anders Sjørslev Schmidt, MD; Kasper Glerup Lauridsen, MD; Bo Løfgren, MD, PhD, FESC, FAHA; Andi Eie Albertsen, MD, PhD Abstract Background Methods Hypthesis Funding: The Study is supported by […] Trial Registration: clinicaltrials.gov, Unique Identifier: Background and hypothesis Methods Study setting The [ELECTRODE] study is a prospective, randomized, investor-initiated, muliticenter clinical trial investigating the efficacy and safety of anterior-posterior electrode position versus anterior-lateral electrode position in cardioverting atrial fibrillation.
